channel.title: GLDuke 3D and JDoom/Doomsday under Win 7 Ultimate 64bit
channel.description:
i don't get GLDuke 3D (error message that no duke.grp was found - but the duke.grp is in the right folder) to run and Doomsday has no sound under Win 7 64bit. i've set them to compatibility mode already but this doesn't help.
maybe someone knows how to get them to run proberly under 7 64bit and could help me?
